data.message:
Shady, I remebered when you said that we your fans shouldn't cry when you re gone for good but very sad we haven't heard from you,all these while,though I guess this is not the right time to go,nd no one will ever ever rap like you do,you re the best rapper in the world,please come back,you re my inspiration,the reason why I shouldn't fail,but look now it feel like our dreams re fading...
We re still waiting for you SLIM we miss you a lot...
